sentences.en: A parrot can mimic a person's voice.
Designing silicon chips to mimic human organs sounds fanciful.
sentences.cn: 设计硅芯片模仿人的器官听上去是异想天开。

sentences.en: Don't try to mimic anybody. You have to be yourself if you are going to do your best.
sentences.cn: 不要试图仿效任何人，要是你想做到最好，就得做你自己。

sentences.en: He could mimic all the teachers’ accents.
sentences.cn: 他能模仿所有老师的口音。

sentences.en: He used to mimic speech peculiarities of another.
sentences.cn: 他过去总是模仿别人讲话的特点.

sentences.en: In a mirage the desert will mimic a lake.
sentences.cn: 在海市蜃楼中,沙漠有时会现出湖泊的形象.

sentences.en: It can remember and mimic up to 15 kinds of rhythmic patterns.
sentences.cn: 它最多可记住并模仿15种节奏的敲击声.

sentences.en: Mimic - based visual interface - gives a clear indication of plant status at a glance.
sentences.cn: 迷你视觉接口 - 主机状态快速清晰显示.

sentences.en: Neural networks are computer systems which mimic the workings of the brain.
sentences.cn: 神经网络是模拟大脑工作方式的计算机系统。

sentences.en: Second, funds that mimic indexes will almost always have lower fees because of the passive investment strategy of managers of index funds.
sentences.cn: 第二，因为指数基金管理者的被动式投资策略，那些模仿指数的基金的运营费用总是更低廉。

sentences.en: Some affected children will have skin lesions that mimic urticaria.
sentences.cn: 有些被感染的儿童会出现类似风疹的皮肤损害.

sentences.en: The international level sport is frankly mimic warfare.
sentences.cn: 坦率地说,国际范围的运动就是一场模拟战争.

sentences.en: There are insects which mimic leaves.
This gives the 3 rd house person the ability to mimic.
sentences.cn: 这赋予第三宫的人模仿的能力.

sentences.en: To mimic slavishly but often with an absurd result.
sentences.cn: 盲目模仿但经常带有荒唐结果.

sentences.en: Tom was a brilliant mimic who could impersonate most of the college staff.
sentences.cn: 汤姆的模仿能力是超一流的，他能惟妙惟肖地模仿学院里的大多数老师。

words.tran_cn: 模仿，模拟；（动物等）拟态伪装
效颦者，模仿者；仿制品；小丑

trans.tran_cn: 巧于模仿的人，复写品或仿制品，摹拟笑剧的演员

trans.tran_en: to copy the way someone speaks or behaves, especially in order to make people laugh

trans.tran_cn: 模仿，学样，摹拟，[生]拟形，拟色
trans.tran_en: to copy the way someone speaks or behaves, especially in order to make people laugh
